public static final java.lang.String emailReg "((\\w)+(\\.\\w+)*@(\\w)+((\\.\\w+)+))"
public static final java.lang.String headReg "<head>.*?</head>"
public static final java.lang.String hrefReg "<a[^>]*href=\\s*\"(([^\"]*)\"|\'([^\']*)\'|([^\\s>]*))\"[^>]*>(.*?)</a>"
public static final java.lang.String newlineReg "[\n\r\f\t]"
public static final java.lang.String noteReg "^//.*"
public static final java.lang.String phoneReg "(((13[0-9])|(15[^4,\\D])|(18[0,5-9]))\\d{8})"
public static final java.lang.String scriptReg "<script.*?</script>"
public static final java.lang.String tagReg "<[^>]*>"

public static final double weight 1.0
